S04bsu025_u:2_0: atha te tīrthikā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ savikalpāḥ savitarkā mahāyānikamupasṛtya sādarakṛtāñjalipuṭā
S04bsu025_u:2_1: nairātmyapraśnaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - nairātmakaṃ śarīramiti kulaputra sarvajñena nirdiśyate /
S04bsu025_u:3: yadi śarīraṃ nairātmakam, paramātmā na vidyate /
S04bsu025_u:5: tadasmākaṃ saṃdehaṃ mocayitumarhati bhagavān - kimasti śarīre paramātmā, kiṃ vā nāsti?
S04bsu025_u:6: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - mārṣāḥ, śarīre paramātmā astītyucyate, na hi nāstīti /
S04bsu025_u:10: tatkathaṃ mārṣāḥ keśanakhadantacarmaromasirāmāṃsāsthimedamajjāsnāyuplīhāntranālaśiraḥkaracaraṇāṅgasakalaśarīre sa bāhyābhyantare vicāryamāṇe na dṛśyate paramātmā?
S04bsu025_u:11: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - na dṛśyate kulaputra paramātmā /
S04bsu025_u:14: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣā divyacakṣuṣo 'pi paśyanti /
S04bsu025_u:15: yasya na varṇo na rūpaṃ na saṃskāraḥ, tatkathaṃ dṛśyate?
S04bsu025_u:21: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - yadi kulaputra nocyate astīti vā nāstīti vā, tatkimatrālambanaṃ bhavatu?
S04bsu025_u:22: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣāḥ kiṃcidālambanaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu025_u:28: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - kīdṛśī maya, kīdṛśaḥ svapnaḥ, kidṛśa indrajāla iti?
S04bsu025_u:33: punaraparaṃ dvau bhedau vinirdiṣṭau yaduta saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca /
S04bsu025_u:36: evaṃ jīvaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalaḥ kārakaḥ vedakaḥ /
S04bsu025_u:39: evaṃ na jīvo na pudgalaḥ na puruṣaḥ na kārakaḥ na vedakaḥ na dhanaṃ - - - - - sā madhyamā pratipattirdharmāṇām / tatredamucyate -
S04bsu025_u:46: muktimārgaṃ na paśyanti andhā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ /
S04bsu025_u:49: paramārthaṃ na jānanti bhavo yatra nirudhyate /
S04bsu025_u:52: bhavaṃ cyutiṃ tathā loke punarāyānti yānti ca // 6 //
S04bsu025_u:56: cyutirasti ca sarveṣāṃ tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 8 //
S04bsu025_u:58: punaste narakaṃ yānti tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 9 //
S04bsu025_u:65: na kāṭhinyaṃ na ca mṛdutvaṃ na coṣṇaṃ naiva śītalam /
S04bsu025_u:66: na saṃsparśaṃ na ca grāhyaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 13 //
S04bsu025_u:67: na dīrghaṃ nāpi vā hrasvaṃ na piṇḍaṃ na trikoṇakam /
S04bsu025_u:68: na kṛśaṃ nāpi na sthūlaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 14 // (#
S04bsu025_u:70: na śveta nāpi raktaṃ ca na kṛṣṇaṃ na ca pītakam /
S04bsu025_u:78: sarvaṃ ca tena sādṛśyaṃ niḥsāraṃ budbudopamam /
S04bsu025_u:82: abhrāntare yathā vidyut kṣaṇādapi na dṛśyate /
S04bsu025_u:84: krīḍitaṃ hasitaṃ nityaṃ jalpitaṃ ruditaṃ tathā /
S04bsu025_u:85: nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ tathā vādyaṃ sarvaṃ svapnopamaṃ hi tat // 22 //
S04bsu025_u:87: svapnaṃ ca cittasaṃkalpaṃ cittaṃ ca gaganopamam // 23 //
S04bsu025_u:89: sa sa rvapāpanirmuktaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // 24 //
S04bsu025_u:94: atha te tīrthikāstuṣṭā vikalparahitāstadā bhāvanāṃ samādhāya mahāyānayajñalābhino 'bhūvanniti //
